channel.title: Copy on Awesome Patrick

item.title: Docker host - container 간 복사
item.description: $ docker cp --help Usage: docker cp [OPTIONS] CONTAINER:SRC_PATH DEST_PATH|- docker cp [OPTIONS] SRC_PATH|- CONTAINER:DEST_PATH Copy files/folders between a container and the local filesystem Options: -L, --follow-link Always follow symbol link in SRC_PATH --help Print usage 현재 사용하고 있는 docker 버전은 17.05.0-ce인데 docker docs (18.03 기준)에는 새로
